detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract APYCore (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APYCore.sol#229-307) has payable functions:
	 - APYCore.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APYCore.sol#234-236)
	 - APYCore.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APYCore.sol#238-249)
	 - APYCore.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APYCore.sol#251-255)
	 - APYCore.batchSend(address[],uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APYCore.sol#258-270)
	 - APYCore.constructor(string,string,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/APYCore.sol#298-306)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
